timeline.bodyText: I am wondering if we should add the author and text to toString method in the case where we log a sensitive data I mean. what each person says :)
timeline.author: RSalem07

replies.bodyText: Good interrogation, I don't have any clue on this. Maybe the @nuxeo/platform team?
replies.author: kevinleturc

replies.bodyText: Interesting question... is it more or less secure than logging document titles (DocumentModelImpl#toString implementation)?
replies.author: troger

replies.bodyText: Agreed, the id is enough imho.
replies.author: efge

replies.bodyText:
Agree with you @troger, that's I didn't have any clue...
In the end, I rollbacked.
replies.author: kevinleturc

timeline.author: RSalem07

replies.bodyText: I don't want to change the implementation there, If this has worked until there I would rather keep it. I just added a doPriviledge because only administrator case was tested before.
replies.author: kevinleturc
